website_summaries.verdict: These easy to use little balls smell fresh and leave no mess behind.
pros: Just throw them in your shoe or gym bag to take away odors
You can control how much of the odor you want to release
Made to look like sports balls
A good way to prevent bad odors from starting
You can roll them onto the floor of a closet
cons: This is not an odor remover
It also gets "used up" and needs to be replaced on a regular basis

customer_reviews.title: I understand you want keep your shoes from smelling, ...
customer_reviews.text: I understand you want keep your shoes from smelling, but! The scent used in this product is so overwhelming. If you are sensitive to any strong perfume or scents, this is not the product to buy. I was looking for something that controlled smells by charcoal filtering.
customer_reviews.author: S. Schaffer

customer_reviews.title: Must-Have for Any Athlete
customer_reviews.text: Basketball shoes, training shoes, football cleats, whatever the sport, we all know those shoes stink. Simply toss these sneaker balls in when the shoes aren't on your feet, and done. They don't last forever is the only issue, so after a couple months, you might want to change them out. The smell of the sneaker balls never completely fades, but it does significantly decrease over time. If you're wondering about the smell, it's basically baking soda. I highly recommend these for all athletes, gym goers, or those with generally smelly shoes :)
customer_reviews.author: The Next Big Thing

customer_reviews.title: Anti theft packaging
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product before. It makes your shoes smell like laundry detergent; however the reason why I am giving this product a one star review is because of how they packaged it. Each ball is enveloped in its very own plastic circle and it’s hard as hell to get out. I literally spent 15 minutes trying to get one ball out. I ended up cutting my hand on the packaging a few times and only was able to remove one ball. I stopped trying because my hand now is bleeding.
customer_reviews.author: SV

customer_reviews.title: Carcinogen-scented power balls
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my work bag which was started to get a funky smell. These little balls DEFINITELY covered up every other scent in their path... with a gag-inducing artificial scent.. I've never had asthma, but now I think I know what it feels like.
customer_reviews.author: The Davidsons

customer_reviews.title: Weird smell
customer_reviews.text: If they smelled better I think I would've put a 5 stars because they do last a long time and work, they just smell bad lol. They do the job and eliminate odors but at the cost of replacing with a weird odor all in itself so kind of pointless to use in my opinion, now that I've been using it for a few months. I'd rather use my shoe sprays. The sprays eliminate faster and are unscented compared to these. Also, they came in at my Marshall's store for way cheaper, without my discount these were already several bucks cheaper than this price.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Pham

customer_reviews.title: Good (not necessarily great) value
customer_reviews.text: The description asserts that the product "removes" odors; as such, I'm basing my review around that. I certainly wouldn't say that these sneaker balls remove any of the odor from my sweaty shoes, seeing as the shoes return to smelling bad as soon as I remove the balls. That said, these deodorizers do a very good job of masking the odor while they are in my shoes. So, I'd say this product performs more or less as well as I had expected. They aren't anything special, but they get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Alex R.

customer_reviews.title: How do I open it?
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is fine. It works as described. The scent is fresh and it lasts a long time. That is, if you can get it out of the package. 15 minutes to open is way too long, and I came close to impaling myself with sharp scissors several times.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Tudor

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance didnt last
customer_reviews.text: They make a strong fragrance for a couple of weeks...then nothing Despite having kept the opening at the minimum. they don't last long enough to be a practical solution for your mud room or shoe closet Ideally you would like the aroma to last for a moth or more...cant spend 20$ a month for each pair of shoes
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: They have a very strong smell.
customer_reviews.text: These do cover up bad smells but they do it by overcoming them with a very strong smell that they emanate. I don't like the smell and it makes me sneeze so these really don't work for me. I've discovered that Arm and Hammer have a similar product which uses baking soda which really absorbs smells without adding any extra odor to the air.
customer_reviews.author: Anndrianna

customer_reviews.title: Works Under Certain Conditions
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears heavy construction boots and since it's been the hot summer his boots absolutely stink. I bought these for his boots and they did nothing. He then tried to ozone the boots to get rid of bacteria THEN used these. Once the bacteria was ozoned away, these worked like a charm to get the remainder of the stink out! Long story short, if it's NOT related to bacteria in your shoes this will get the stink right out! Otherwise, you'll need to deep clean first.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Bond

customer_reviews.title: No more smells
customer_reviews.text: These didn't fit anyone, as they are not made to wear. However, extremely suitable for my nephew who is an athlete. I purc.hased this for him because he owns a hand full of tennis shoes, and these would suit him just fine. When he opened his Christmas gift, he was very happy. They have great colors and look very sporty. There are 3 sets of Sneaker Balls, and all three are different colors. They are sleek and are very appealing in design. I received them when promised, and was packaged just right. If the need arises, I wouldn't mind ordering again from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great for motorcycle boots
customer_reviews.text: I felt bad because I share a pretty small office with several other people and I get into work and take off my motorcycle boots and switch to tennis shoes. I was putting my boots in a bag to contain the smell, but that only made it worse once I took them out. Now I put these in my boots when I switch to my shoes and then put them in my shoes when I switch back to my boots in the evening. It's made a huge difference, and I'm sure my co-workers appreciate them as well
customer_reviews.author: CrazyCatLady72

customer_reviews.title: Good for small odors/shoes, not good for work boots
customer_reviews.text: These would be fine for sneakers or gym shoes. I was looking for something stronger for my work boots. I put insoles in them and now there is an odor. Plus, I work around water sometimes and the boots have gotten wet. I noticed a difference the first day, but I had to use all 6 balls for my pair. The second day, not so well. Third, they are used up and my boots still smell.
customer_reviews.author: E. Arce

customer_reviews.title: Great for shoes kept in lockers
customer_reviews.text: I'm a general surgeon, and I put these in my Birkenstock rubber clogs (worn during "messy" surgeries) that are otherwise kept in my hospital locker. The Birkenstock rubber clogs make my feet super sweaty being that they are rubber without any openings in the toe cap like Crocs. The Birkenstock clogs also have cork arch support inserts, which seem to hold onto the moisture caused by the sweat. Thus, you can only imagine the smell. These have helped tremendously in decreasing the "funk" within my locker.
customer_reviews.author: medmikey

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty potent and smells awful
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would of read more reviews before buying these. I bought them for my gym and work shoes in hopes of eliminating some foot odor. Once I twisted it open, my nose was burnt with an awful scent. It’s pretty potent and smells awful. Not to mention I don’t want to smell like I’m trying to cover up my stinky feet. Just no.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Michelle Custer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly worked really well, I didn’t think it worked at first but when I took my foot out after having had the balls in my work shoes the night before and then working a 10 hr day all I smelled was the laundry detergent smell from the balls and not my sweaty foot so I think they work great! For someone with feet that smell like a deal animal like my husband didn’t work as well but for regular stinky feet people recommend:)
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas W.

customer_reviews.title: Works Alright
customer_reviews.text: These worked well, but I could smell the deodorant scent when wearing my dress shoes. I'd leave the balls in whenever I wasn't wearing them, then at work when I crossed my legs I could smell the scent. It's not a bad scent, but it was a little annoying, since ideally I'd want no scent. Still, it's better than foot odor.
customer_reviews.author: Qsilver7850

customer_reviews.title: A breath of fresh air
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to go in my husband's gym bag and his sneakers. They are amazing! You simply twist them and toss them wherever needs refreshing. My nephew left wet clothes in his bookbag and the mildew smell was terrible! These worked wonders on that bag and eventually it smelled new again! These keep sneakers smelling fresh and prevent that heavy odor from forming.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Use over and over
customer_reviews.text: Continue to use this product because it smells nice and helps reduce the stink in the bedrooms from tennis shoe odor. I can tell when the kids forget to put the balls in their shoes. The room does not smell as fresh as it does with the balls in the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: K. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Helps with stinky feet
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my brother because the smell of his feet is absolutely gut wrenching. We have tried many different products and these are certainly ones for the books. They really work and I'm just going to have to keep buying some for whenever he loses his current pair.
customer_reviews.author: TheEsmerChan

customer_reviews.title: They’re okay
customer_reviews.text: I don’t want to judge this item too hard because I can imagine it’s hard for the manufacturer to maintain the smell inside the balls. They last maybe 2 weeks at the most but truthfully they are the best on the market. They smell decently strong. Don’t buy these expecting them to take bad smells out of your shoes. In my option they’re more preventative to keep shoes fresh before they start to smell bad.
customer_reviews.author: amunevar

customer_reviews.title: They really work!
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son plays basketball and his room smelled like stinky teenage boy socks - the worst smell ever! I got these and put one in his gym bag, and one in his laundry basket. They really work! I was skeptical that anything could get rid of that smell. The smell is not gone totally, but now I am not afraid that I will pass out when I walk by his room.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Smells very strongly
customer_reviews.text: My fault I suppose, I thought this would be more of a charcoal (absorbing) product despite the package stating "fresh scent". This is not a deodorizer, it is a strong chemical soap smell that tries to mask smells. Just not what I needed. Even when the ball is closed, you can smell it from a foot or so away.
customer_reviews.author: Riley C

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love these little things! You just twist to open and get the smell good. You can open as much or as little as you like so the scent is just the right strength for you. I drop a set in my boots every evening when I take them off and my boots are fresh and ready to put on every morning. These little things last quite a while too! I've been using mine for almost 5 months now and the scent is still going strong...looks like I may even get another 5+ months out of them! I will definitely be buying more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness for sneaker balls!
customer_reviews.text: I can't buy enough of these! Works great for shoes closed up in the closet, locker or gym bag. The only complaint I have about them is that they seem to disappear, but I am sure that the teenage boy in my house is more to blame for that than the sneaker balls themselves.
customer_reviews.author: ksjayhawk

customer_reviews.title: Good stink deterrents
customer_reviews.text: The sneaker balls have a strong scent that can remove any light to medium smells. However, if you have really sweaty feet or old shoes then the reason it will probably not eliminate odor is because the smell causing bacteria has grown into the soles. At that point you should either get new shoes or replace the soles with new ones and use these balls to deter the stink. I had some old shoes and once I replaced the soles they were stink free and the balls were good to keep them from stinking up any further.
customer_reviews.author: mcisneros

customer_reviews.title: they are a bit odd-smelling - sort of like a moth ball or fertilizer
customer_reviews.text: I've smelled foot odor. I've smelled these Sneaker Balls. I prefer the foot odor. Well, in all seriousness, they are a bit odd-smelling - sort of like a moth ball or fertilizer. They work, though, and keep my shoes fresh when I'm not using them. I'm glad I tried them.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: My favorite !
customer_reviews.text: As I grew up (24 now) I seen these in shoe stores at the mall but I never was a sneaker head or at least cared enough about my shoes & how they smelled. As an adult that buys $100 + shoes I now have the need to keep my shoes in tip top shape & odor is my # 1 enemy.. buying these left me AMAZED ! No more odor ! & you don’t necessarily have to use em on shoes either ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Not effective deodorizer for shoes/sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Not good for shoes but more so for gym bags. I tried using it for my sneakers I wear for work and it doesn’t really deoderize the shoe. The scent from the it actually adds onto the smelly feet aroma which isn’t anymore pleasant. Wouldn’t recommend for shoes/sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: PeeJV

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but not exceptional.  good for a gym bag/shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea, and the simplicity. However, just not SUPER effective. I imagined after 2 days in the shoes, they would smell at least neutral. Usually, after 2 days, my shoes do smell better, but still pretty bad. I'm not sure if its a diffusing issue or just an engineering issue, but I'm pretty sure i'll be just using them until they quite putting out smell, and i wouldn't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan E Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Balls work for two months
customer_reviews.text: Initially, they work and help keep things smelling better. They only last though for about two months before needing to be replaced. I bought them for my son, a teenage boy who plays sports...I bought them for his wrestling shoes. After about two months, the balls actually got moldy... I imagine from being in sweaty teenage shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Dorazio

customer_reviews.title: Left my shoes smelling terrible
customer_reviews.text: The balls itself smell good but after putting them in my shoes that I don't wear very often it left them with a horrible smell. So bad that it gives me a headache every time I wear the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Stinky Stinky
customer_reviews.text: I got this because of stinky shoes from sweat. After using it for a week, the smell is still there, mixed in with the ball scent. I would use it for shoes that don’t have a strong odor or else it doesn’t really work that well.
customer_reviews.author: Chip Chocolate

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing! We live in Miami and with the heat and humidity, shoes can start to smell pretty fast. Throw these balls in there and a day later they smell new. Buy them they work! They also work to pull the smell of smoke out of clothes. We even bring them while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Bad pack maybe?
customer_reviews.text: I've used these in the past and they used to work well. Unsure why they stopped working for me. I even bought a new pack in case mine were too old and still nothing. I tried throwing 2 pairs of balls into my work shoes and they still smell pretty bad. Wish I could return but I already used them.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka

customer_reviews.title: Great For Daily Work Boots
customer_reviews.text: Love the fresh scent. You don’t even have to crack them open at first to let the scent out. I actually took my old ones apart and soaked them with Febreeze to reactivate them again until I found this new 3-pack I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: They'll ultimately do what you need them to do. I used mine for my boxing shoes; a lot of sweat & a lot of stink if you don't combat the odor. These little balls do that, and do it well. Is the "freshness" smell great? Not really, but it beats the stank that those shoes would emit otherwise! I'd recommend these to anyone looking to decrease the odor in workout items--just don't expect Downy fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Derek K.

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Pros - temporary gets rid of the stink from athletes foot. Smell is long lasting if left for 1-2 days inside shoes Cons- Can get expensive to restock when scents run out. Is not a permanent solution for shoes that stink. You have a better chance if you put your sneakers in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a recommendation from a friend for a trip I was taking. I LOVE them. They deodorize my shoes without making me smell like a linen closet, aren't overwhelming scenty for those with sensitive noses, and the smell doesn't smell "fake", just fresh and truly deodorizes rather than just changes the smell. I would recommend these to anyone needing smell free items that may otherwise smell.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Doss

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: They work well, and the smell isn't overpowering. In fact, it's more of a neutralizer; you can't smell the nice fragrance it gives off unless you're close to the shoe, and who goes around smelling people's shoes? Bottom line? They're worth it - pop it in after you get home and let it do it's job.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these! They smell horrible!!! I placed one in my gym bag and the shell crack open and the spongy ball rolled around and made my entire bag smell like a chemically infused flower. It was nasty!
customer_reviews.author: theasian

customer_reviews.title: No more smelly shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived the next day, &work great! I have usually have really stinky feet especially after work & my shoes always have an odor coming from them. I popped the sneaker balls in & left them overnight & by the next day they smelled like fresh linen! No more bad odor but I tend to leave them in every day just in case. Great product, will be ordering more soon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not so sure
customer_reviews.text: while they do have a deodorizing smell to them they don't do much in terms of shoe odor deterrent. I have been using them for about a month have noticed little difference.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Fabric sheets?
customer_reviews.text: What this does not do: Eliminate all the less than pleasant oders coming from the average work boot. What it does do: Covers them up with another, although slightly better, scent.
customer_reviews.author: Braden Butts

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 1 year ago and they still work and smell amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for combatting the stinking man/boy feet in the house! I will definitely be buying these again! We are a whole year in and they still work and smell like the very first day! Simply hold both ends of the ball and turn to close the vents in the middle. Definitely a worthy purchase for any shoe whether it’s stinky or not!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B

customer_reviews.title: Goalie Glove saver!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I bought these for my son to put in his goalie gloves. Any of you who have had the horror of smelling those know just how bad they can be. These lil balls seem to be helping! I wldnt say the foul smell has completely vanished, but just after a couple days use, they're a heck of a lot better than they were!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Used them often and was happy by their effectiveness. Easy to throw in my boots, just took time to remember they were in there before trying to put on my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D.

customer_reviews.title: Strong artificial smell lasts for months
customer_reviews.text: These have a very strong artificial smell. I used them in my boots for several months and realized that eventually the deodorizer smell was so strong I could smell it whenever I wore the shoes. I left my boots in storage for 6 months and still the smell is too strong to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: These really work!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is an athlete and her volleyball shoes sometimes need some assistance! These sneaker balls do the trick. Her shoes are no longer stinky!
customer_reviews.author: silvia

customer_reviews.title: masks odor with fresh scent
customer_reviews.text: The way these balls deodorize your shoes is by masking the smell with a strong scent of cleaning product. I'm not a huge fan of it because I'm sensitive to scents and fragrances. The scent is also a bit too strong. I usually just keep the twist closed.
customer_reviews.author: visualizor

customer_reviews.title: They really work
customer_reviews.text: These are great to have, especially during the summer. My dress shoes seem to smell the worst after a long and hot day at work. These sneaker balls help to eliminate the odor and I don't feel ashamed of leaving my shoes out.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This little things work, I was unsure, but decided to give it a try and wow I was surprised it works I have a set at work in my locker and some at home, shoes feel and smell fresh
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Be consistent, or you’ll get the bad odor back
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product it keeps my gym shoes smelling nice, which i’ve never experienced before, i’ve tried similiar products for amelly shoes, and this one is by far my favorite. You just gotta be aware that the good smell of these are not gonna penetrate your shoes or anything. so if you stop using it at any point you are gonna have the bad smell back at no time,
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work at all
customer_reviews.text: Does not work at all. Didn’t make my work boots smell any better or different at all.
customer_reviews.author: GHawkJax

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: These sneaker balls have a fresh scent smell odor when first open them up they last for a while although they don’t fully take away the sweat odor away as for me they are ok to use as a person that wears construction work boots and is outside most of the time I change the insoles every 3 months but it’s an ok product to use if you want to lower down the smelly odor in your footwear.
customer_reviews.author: Ohany Gomez

customer_reviews.title: They're OK
customer_reviews.text: They're OK for general foot odor maintenance. I still need to use foot powder for most of my shoes after buying this though. I would keep these in shoes I don't wear often, but that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Eh not gonna buy again
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as I thought it would be. The smell isn’t bad but it doesn’t make my shoe smell good and didn’t help with my locker. Plus they dissolved fast.
customer_reviews.author: Anzhelika Vardi

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent
customer_reviews.text: I have close to 400 miles on my running shoes. These sneaker balls do a great job and also keep my car smelling nice. They are not an overwhelming scent as others do. I would recommend these sneaker balls.
customer_reviews.author: 925LH

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I’ve had them for almost a year now, and I’m still using the same set. Lasts long and keeps my faint-inducing gym bag, wrestling shoes, and air riflery glove smelling clean. I do recommend periodically airing things out and cleaning them, because I’m pretty sure it just masks the smell.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: So far he is very happy with them but only time will tell how long ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son because he said he wanted to try and keep his shoes from stinking. So far he is very happy with them but only time will tell how long they will last. The smell from them is very nice,not over powering or smelly. Hopefully they will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Shartman

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Do the job nicely and last a long time. Great for just throwing in a gym bag too.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: sneaker balls
customer_reviews.text: These are a life saver! my sons gym bag was horrible and we added these to his shoes and now I don't gag when I open the bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Odor Eliminator
customer_reviews.text: These balls work great. I bought this pack so I could put them in my running shoes, boat shoes, and regular tennis shoes. If you remember to drop them in after wearing your shoes and always change socks, then these little balls do wonders. Eliminate smells and I am assuming that the lingering chemicals keep the smell from coming back or from starting up. Use to use these years ago in my soccer bag when I would put jerseys and cleats in the same bag and they eliminated that smell as well. Found them on here and decided to re up. I have never found a better substitute.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew F.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have had these in my bag for forever now and as a dancer these are a lifesaver for my dance bag!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Folkes

customer_reviews.title: I don't hate my teenager anymore...
customer_reviews.text: Dear Thor! What's that smell!?!? Used to happen every time I opened the door to my teenager's room. I never knew I could be so happy to see a pair of balls...and to sniff them. These work. Love your teenager again. Buy them. -Mom.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoe scent saver!
customer_reviews.text: Good product for keeping the stink of shoes at bay. Use at work where I keep my work shoes, the drawer can tend to smell just because of foot smell. These have fixed the smell. They also keep the smell from our 10 year old's baseball cleats which is quite the feat!
customer_reviews.author: April Mae

customer_reviews.title: Defective packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Yes they smell wonderful The seal on package was broken. Sadly I used these as stocking stuffers for the boys. Did not realize they do not go well with Holiday candy in the stocking.
customer_reviews.author: c.g.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for shoes or for gym bags
customer_reviews.text: It saved my kid closet! Before I got these, it was imposible to open the door, the stink was too strong, but nowC when you open his closet, it smells like soap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good scent but faint.
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful that this product will solve my stinky gym sneakers problem. The scent was great and was so excited to see how they do overnight. When i was ready to use the sneakers the next day I realized the scent was faint and barely made a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Work well, easy to twist
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a few of these for my husband's shoes. He had said that he could smell his feet at work even though he is at a desk most of the day and he rotates shoes each day so they aren't worn 2 days in a row. Since using these he said they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Terri S

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I've been putting these inside my shoes when not in use and the result has been good. My shoes smell like clean laundry for most of the day! The only way to make this product better is if the balls were smaller so that they could fit into small shoes such as ballet flats. I've been just cramming them in there anyway, but I have a few pairs of Vera Wang ballet flats that I just don't want to risk stretching the leather in, so I've just been putting the ball in the big part of the shoe and hoping for the best. So far, so good! As an added bonus, my entire closet smells like clean laundry!
customer_reviews.author: StarkContrast

customer_reviews.title: but the other half smells good. I think i got an old pacakge
customer_reviews.text: Half of mine had no scent, but the other half smells good. I think i got an old pacakge. Will be contacting for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Light Scent
customer_reviews.text: These little things are good for gym bags or shoes. I keep a couple under the seats in my car too! They smell like laundry but the scent isn’t overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for work boots. I work in security and spend a good majority of my day on my feet. Although my work boots are well ventilated, they still retain odors. I have been using foot spray the entire time I have owned them but after a while they still began to smell. After just one night of these sitting in my boots the odor was already better. After just two days I could not smell them while on my feet anymore. These are a great product, I highly recommend them!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Prevents moisture, odor and lasts long.
customer_reviews.text: Prevent moisture and odor, since I started using these I no longer get athletes feet and my shoes dont smell. I'm on my feet 12 hrs a day 30000 plus steps. I do switch between 2 pair of shoes and place these balls in the unused pair, also I'm on my first pair of these and it's been months " they last". Works great, lasts long and will purchase again in future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, I have bought them twice now, they really help with my sneakers and my gym bag! Excited to get some great use out of these. Leaves a powdery fresh smell instead of a sweaty gym sock one. I’ll take that any day!
customer_reviews.author: India Aust

customer_reviews.title: Easy shoe air freshener
customer_reviews.text: Sneaker airfreshners are a must if you have any athlete in the family. Easy to use. Just twist to open and drop into the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Hsmith

customer_reviews.title: Love the Sneaker Balls
customer_reviews.text: These definitely help cover up the scent in my stinky shoes. No scientific study but a noticeable difference. My wife will even let me bring my shoes back in the bedroom closet. I plan to buy an additional set of 3 to treat more shoes. As it is, I rotate the sneaker balls between different pairs of shoes as needed. The only downside is it does nothing to address the real problem. After another workout or hike my shoes stink again.
customer_reviews.author: QualityViews

customer_reviews.title: Smells better than sweaty shoes
customer_reviews.text: Smells better than the shoes. I have a few packages of these for my teenage boys.
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Kielman

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious great-smelling product to try and tame your active foot-wear odor.
customer_reviews.text: These are a must for any active guy for handling that knarley well-worn shoe smell. Gently twist the two halves open (Dont over twist or you could break them) and you can smell that great clean soap smell coming out. I really cant speak to how effective they are at this point ( I generally dont make it a point to smell the insides of my shoes) but will cone back and leave an update if i can providr more insight for that.
customer_reviews.author: C. Watts

customer_reviews.title: These are Great
customer_reviews.text: These smell great and so fresh. I have had these for a couple of months and they still smell just as great as when i got them. Will buy again and recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: David Keck

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a trainer and loves these for his shoes... and I love that our house doesn’t smell like dirty feet anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good scent!
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy these little guys, they help keep my shoes nice and smelling fresh. The scent does wear down a bit after... I'd like to say two weeks of daily use or so BUT they still do their job of keeping your shoes not smelling like stinky feet 😁
customer_reviews.author: Griselda

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: Smell is fine (laundry smell sounds about right), I threw them in some shoes that see a lot of sweat and it worked nice, the shoes are not considered chemically dangerous anymore. Couple went into my gym bag and I think the third pair will go into the car.
customer_reviews.author: I

customer_reviews.title: Masks the problem
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay product. It covers up the scent but doesn't actually eliminate it. Still, keeps the area by my front door from smelling like gross feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smelly Balls
customer_reviews.text: Dip your balls and allow freshness to come effortlessly. Easy to use and you get three pairs (each pair is a different color) with each package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend these; it will bring new life to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend these; it will bring new life to the freshness of your old shoes. There's no need to open up the vents on the casing. The fragrance is strong enough as is. I bought these on a recommendation and well worth it. Especially if you have smelly gym bags.
customer_reviews.author: theChivefan

customer_reviews.title: They do the job wonderful. My boys have stinky shoes and these are ...
customer_reviews.text: They do the job wonderful. My boys have stinky shoes and these are a life saver! When they bring their smelly shoes in the house, we pop one of these balls into each shoe. It really eliminates the bad odor. Also, the next day, for a while, their shoes don't stink so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Tacy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: These keep sneakers and shoes smelling fresh. The scent is very pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: JJPM2

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I walk and take rail to work at times so I have my work shoes at the office and wearing walking shoes on my way to/from work. I use the deodorizers in the pair I leave at work, and then insert them to my walking shoes when I switch shoes in the office. They were great and also help create a fresh laundry scent in my office as an unintended consequence. They work great.
customer_reviews.author: EA~

customer_reviews.title: The Smell Stoppers!
customer_reviews.text: Just like an Infomercial: You wanna stop odors? You wanna keep your gym bag smelling fresh? Then this is the product for you! Seriously, they work. I keep one or two in my gym bag depending on if it was a basketball day or practice for football which provides a stronger stench. These work within about 30 minutes of twisting them open and placing them in your sneakers or gym bag. They have a powdery fresh scent that's not overpowering. And they tend to last close to a month depending on how much of a smell you're trying to eliminate.
customer_reviews.author: The Truth Teller

customer_reviews.title: Worth
customer_reviews.text: Smell good. I like that they can be "turned off" while not inside my boot. Keeps work locker smelling good
customer_reviews.author: ryan n.

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Work Great for my husbands work boots, I can no longer smell them and they are long lasting
customer_reviews.author: Dare

customer_reviews.title: Smells are dead.  Nuff said!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical these wouldn't work on my kid's sports shoes, but it was a small investment compared to all the other powders out there, we've tried, so we took a chance. Glad we did. Now I can walk into the room without immediately having to run for the door.
customer_reviews.author: Brett R

customer_reviews.title: I mean it made them smell better. But mostly by masking the scent
customer_reviews.text: I mean it made them smell better. But mostly by masking the scent. These would probably be better to prevent bad odors, not correct them.
customer_reviews.author: Albiond

customer_reviews.title: Useful and work well
customer_reviews.text: First, you out one in each show. Over time, you don’t throw them out, you just put another one. Eventually your shoes all smell nice because you have a few in each shoe. Simple and effective.
customer_reviews.author: SAD

customer_reviews.title: Amaze-balls!
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually surprised at how well these things work!! I wear clogs for my 12-hour shifts & now when I take my shoes off I smell the deodorizer instead of stinky feet! These work better than the shoe spray I has been using. Will definitely buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa P.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who has some really smelly stinky feet: to put in his shoes to get rid of the odor. It does more of the job of masking the smell rather then getting rid of the smell. Decided to go with simple baby powder instead which essentially is cornstarch with a pleasant smell. The baby powder work wonders compared to the sneaker balls. Plus it's cheaper too!!!
customer_reviews.author: EddieInSacto

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my mom for Christmas as she ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom for Christmas as she works in a greenhouse and wear boots in which either get wet or she sweats in all throughout the year. I bought the six pack, and she has used one set so far. So far one pair has lasted her three months
customer_reviews.author: Maddie Crompton

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, usable, little stocking stuffer in both girly and masculine designs.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Bettis

product_meta.title: Sof Sole Sneaker Balls Shoe, Gym Bag, and Locker Deodorizer, 3 Pair
product_meta.description:
Sneaker Balls Shoe Deodorizer and Freshener Balls for Shoes, Gym Bags, and Lockers remove foot odors and other odor-causing bacteria from shoes, gym bags, gear bags, lockers, and closets. Sized and shaped to reach and absorb odors in dark, tight places, where other fresheners won’t fit, this pair of odor-absorbing balls is an essential foot care accessory. The balls feature quick-twist action, which opens the vents that release a specially formulated fresh and clean scent. Preserve freshness and the life of the sneaker balls by twisting to close the vents when not in use; scent lasts up to six months depending on how often they are used to fight odors. Sneaker Balls Shoe Deodorizer and Freshener Balls fit in all shoe sizes, from kid through adult, and effectively attack odors in athletic shoes and everyday footwear, as well as gym and gear bags. Available in pairs, or 3-pair bundles. Each ball has a diameter of 1.5 inches.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :6 x 1 x 10 inches; 2.4 Ounces
 * Item model number :87021
 * Department :Unisex-adult
 * Date First Available :March 24, 2010
 * Manufacturer :Sof Sole
 * ASIN :B003IJ6HFM

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #1,114 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #22 inShoe Care & Accessories

The balls feature quick-twist action, which opens the vents that release a specially formulated fresh and clean scent. Preserve freshness and the life of the sneaker balls by twisting to close the vents when not in use; scent lasts up to six months depending on how often they are used to fight odors. Sneaker Balls Shoe Deodorizer and Freshener Balls fit in all shoe sizes, from kid through adult, and effectively attack odors in athletic shoes and everyday footwear, as well as gym and gear bags. Available in pairs, or 3-pair bundles. Each ball has a diameter of 1.5 inches.
